text:
I use a diferent doclet using the <doclet> netsted in javadoc and the
<linkoffline> nested tag is not beeing passed to the doclet.
creator: krico@users.sourceforge.net
conor@apache.org
text:
Please read this
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.3/docs/tooldocs/win32/javadoc.html#standard

-linkoffline is actually an option of the standard doclet and it is therefore 
not passed to custom doclets.
